title: Definitions
context: ยง171-71 Definitions. As used in this part if not inconsistent with the context: &ldquo;Appraisers&rdquo; means one or more, but not more than three, real estate appraisers appointed by the board. &ldquo;Lessee&rdquo; means the lessee under a residential lease and the successors in interest of the lessee. &ldquo;Person&rdquo; means one or more individuals and does not include any partnership, firm, or corporation. &ldquo;Residential lease&rdquo; or &ldquo;lease&rdquo; means a residential lease made by the board of land and natural resources under this part. [L 1962, c 32, pt of ยง2; Supp, ยง103A-67; HRS ยง171-71] Revision Note Definitions rearranged.
